devdoc.details: Based on https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/cryptography/ECDSA.solBased on https://github.com/pubkey/eth-cryptoAdapted by: Dennison Bertram, dennison@dennisonbertram.com, dennison@zeppelin.solutions Easily verify a message was signed by a particlar key, or recover the signing address.
